about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a frontend engineer and UX/UI designer with experience in design and product development. I specialize in building responsive interfaces and scalable component systems that transform design concepts into interactive digital experiences.
about.paragraph2: I'm proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and actively contribute to frontend development workflows. I have hands-on experience with React and Vue, as well as styling tools like Sass, Tailwind, styled-components, GSAP, and Quasar. I'm also familiar with API integration and Git version control.
about.paragraph3: With a background in design, I approach development from a user-centered perspectiveâ€”ensuring visual consistency and intuitive experience logic. I enjoy exploring new technologies and best practices, continuously improving my frontend skills and bridging the gap between design and development. My work spans across e-commerce platforms, large-scale applications, and cross-functional team collaborations.

graphicDesign.title: Graphic Design
graphicDesign.description: Studied graphic design and became proficient in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).

ucsdVisualArt.title: Visual Arts - Interdisciplinary
ucsdVisualArt.description: Blended art and technology to approach design with creativity and precision.

hunchTech.title: UI/UX Designer
hunchTech.description: Worked on UI/UX design, game interfaces, web creation with Wix, and Firebase integration.

nadiSystem.title: UI/UX Designer
nadiSystem.description: Led smart factory, smart building, and telecom UI projects with Unity, Figma, and data dashboards.

rogersAI.title: UI/UX Designer
rogersAI.description: Designed internal tools and AI interfaces, ran usability testing and prototyped user flows.

woWorld.title: UI/UX & Frontend Developer
woWorld.description: Developed responsive frontend modules and contributed to UI/UX improvements in e-commerce workflows.

invoice.title: Invoice Management App
invoice.description: A Vue 3 SPA with Firebase. Create, edit, and delete invoice records with persistent sync.

jsModule.title: JS Module Practice

saas.title: SaaS Landing Page
saas.description: A modern SaaS landing page with animation, dark mode, and language toggle.

shop.title: Shop Products UI
shop.description: Shopping interface with cart, sidebar quantity control, and toast confirmation after checkout.

film.title: Film Explorer
film.description: A responsive movie search app using OMDb API and a dynamic slider layout.
